alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; Miller (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 5:36PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Miller and southwestern Lafayette Counties, northwestern Caddo, northwestern Bossier Parishes in northwestern Louisiana and southeastern Cass Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 535 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kildare, or 9 miles south of Atlanta, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Vivian, Rodessa, Ida, Bivins, Ravanna, McLeod, Brightstar, Kildare, Bloomburg, Pleasant Valley, Canale, Fort Lynn and Kiblah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Arkansas...northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas.
